summary.para: Set TOP Wizard Application list enabled/ disabled.
Type of generated Keys for users (RNG, RSA, CUSTOM RSA).
Changing the key format, invalidate all the users secret keys previously used.
RSA and RSA Custom are using Certificates. Custom RSA must Use Specific database to the keys and certs, one for each user, see New-MFASecretKeysDatabase cmdlet.
Used to trim the key at a fixed size, when you use RSA the key is very long, and QRCode is often too big for TOTP Application (1024 is a good size, even if RSA key is 2048 bytes long).

member.name: P:MFA.PSBiometricProvider.DirectLogin
member.summary: When Biometrics is default method, authentication directly called a first time 3

summary.para: Timeout property (in milliseconds).
Timestamp Drift Tolerance property (in milliseconds).
Challenge Size property (16, 32, 48, 64 bytes) (128, 256, 384, 512 bits).
Server Domain property.
Server Name property.
Server Icon property (url).
Server Uri property (url).
Pin requirements for unverified biometrics devices.
Name biometric device at registration (NickName).
Browsers can't use biometric authentication (eg: IE).
Operating Systems that can use biometric authentication with user initiated action (eg: Safari for TouchID and FaceID).

member.name: T:MFA.PSPreferredMethod
member.summary:
PSPreferredMethod
MFA Preferred method (Choose, Code, Email, External, Azure, Biometrics), if sibling Provider is active.
MFA Preferred method (Choose, Code, Email, External, Azure, Biometrics).

summary.para: Choose, let users to choose between differnet available active modes

Code, default mode for users is TOTP computed number, available with authenticator Applications on thier mobile device. (MFA : 2 Facors for authentication, What i know (my login/passord) and wahat i hold (my device))
Email, default mode for users is email, an email is sent avec acces code.

External, default mode for users is SMS or any solution developped, this an be async. A Sanmple if provided for Azure MFA (old version from PhoneFactors). You can also watch to the "Quiz Provider Sample"
Azure, default mode for users is Azure MFA, Like default Azure MFA Provider in ADFS 2016 and up.
Biometrics, default mode for users is biometric authentication, based on WebAuthN specification.
Pin, Not Used .
None, do not change anything.

member.name: T:MFA.PSReplayLevel
member.summary:
PSReplayLevel
MFA TOTP Replay feature (Disabled, Intermediate, Full).
Disabled : Replay feature is disabled (default).
Intermediate : TOTP Replay is active, except fomr the same machine.
Full : TOTP Replay is fully active (more secure).

summary.para: Replay feature is disabled (default)
TOTP Replay is active, except from the same machine.
TOTP Replay is fully active (more secure).

member.name: T:MFA.PSADDSTemplateKind
member.summary:
PSADDSTemplateKind
Kind of the attributes list template (SchemaAll, Schema2016, SchemaMFA).
SchemaAll : Schema template compatible with all ADDS 2012 and up Schema versions.
Schema2016 : Schema template compatible with all ADDS 2016 and up Schema versions (87).
SchemaMFA : Custom Schema template for MFA, yoy must modify Shecma with supplied LDIF scripts.

summary.para: Schema template compatible with all ADDS 2012 and up Schema versions
Schema template compatible with all ADDS 2016 and up Schema versions (87)
Custom Schema template for MFA, yoy must modify Shecma with supplied LDIF scripts

member.name: T:MFA.PSSecretKeyFormat
member.summary:
PSSecretKeyFormat
MFA TOTP key generation mode (RNG, RSA and CUSTOM.
RND (Random,Number Generator) Strong generator for numbers, From 128 bytes to 512 bytes. can be stored in ADDS or SQL default MFA Database.
RSA A Shared Certificate 2048 bytes, including encrypted logon name. can be stored in ADDS or SQL default MFA Database.
CUSTOM A Certificate 2048 bytes for each user, including encrypted logon name. can only be stored in SQL Keys MFA Database.

summary.para: RNG (Ramdom Number Generator).
RSA encryption.
AES encryption .
CUSTOM encryption.

member.name: T:MFA.PSSecretKeyVersion
member.summary:
PSSecretkeyVersion
MFA TOTP key Encryption Lib version (V1, V2).
V1 Old Encryption Library less secure. for compatibility
New Encryption Library more secure.

summary.para: Old Encryption Library less secure, you must select V2 as soon as possible.
New Encryption Library more secure.

member.name: T:MFA.PSForceWizardMode
member.summary:
PSForceWizardMode
Fallback mode when user have choosed "I'have no code".
If Enabled or Strict, force user to run Wizard after choose "I'have no code". Only available with PowerShell

summary.para: Fallback is disabled, this is the default
Fallback is enabled, the user can cancel Wizard registration
Fallback is strict, the user cannot cancel Wizard registration

member.name: T:MFA.PSUserFeaturesOptions
member.summary:
PSUserFeaturesOptions
Configuration options for registering or accessing MFA. Must be combined with binary OR.
Configuration options for registering or accessing MFA. Must be combined with binary OR, in MMC you can use Templates

summary.para: NoSet, must not be used.
BypassUnRegistered, Allow user access if not registered in MFA.
BypassDisabled, Allow user access if not enabled in MFA.
AllowUnRegistered, Allow user access if not registered in MFA. But, the user is invited to register
AllowDisabled, Allow user access if not enabled in MFA. But, the user is invited to enable his account
AllowChangePassword, Change password link is provided for user in "Manage My options"
AllowManageOptions, Manage my options link is provided for user."
AllowProvideInformations, When not registered or enabled, user can post informations to administrators, and ask them to activate thier account."
AllowEnrollment, Allow Wizards link for enabled Providers."
AdministrativeMode, Lock access to users if not registered o disabled."

member.name: T:MFA.PSWebAuthNPinRequirements
member.summary:
PSWebAuthNPinRequirements
Configuration options for Pin requirement when Biometric login, the user is not verified. Must be combined with binary OR.
Configuration options for Pin requirement when Biometric login, the user is not verified. Must be combined with binary OR.

summary.para: Null, No requirement for pin.
None, Pin requirement for None Attestation type when user is not verified.
AndroidKey, Pin requirement for AndroidKey Attestation type when user is not verified.
AndroidSafetyNet, Pin requirement for AndroidSafetyNet Attestation type when user is not verified.
Fido2U2f, Pin requirement for Fido2U2f Attestation type when user is not verified.
Packed, Pin requirement for Packed Attestation type when user is not verified.
TPM, Pin requirement for TPM Attestation type when user is not verified.

member.name: T:MFA.PSKeySizeMode
member.summary:
PSKeySizeMode
For RSA and Custom, encryption Key is 2018 bytes, but this generate a huge QRCode, to restrict the display Size.
Restricts QRCode size, by default 1024 bytes

summary.para: KeySizeDefault, 2048 bytes length for encryption and 1024 bytes for display
KeySize512, 2048 bytes length for encryption and 512 bytes for display
KeySize1024, 2048 bytes length for encryption and 1024 bytes for display
KeySize2048, 2048 bytes length for encryption and 2048 bytes for display

member.name: T:MFA.PSHashMode
member.summary:
PSHashMode
Hash algo for TOTP Key generation, default is SHA1. (see rfc6238, rfc4226)
Microsoft, Google and others only supports SHA1, but rfc specification says that it can be 256, 384 and 512. Only Authy supports higher values.

summary.para: SHA1, default hashing for TOTP key generation
SHA256, hashing for TOTP key generation. supported by Authy authenticator App.
SHA384, hashing for TOTP key generation. supported by Authy authenticator App.
SHA512, hashing for TOTP key generation. supported by Authy authenticator App.

Get MFA Farm Informations.

If not initialized, you must run the Register-MFASystem and optionally Register-MFAComputer (2012R2).
Register MFA Computer.
Regiter an ADFS server from your farm.
If your farm is Windows 2016 (behavior 3), Register-MFASystem is doing the job.
For Windows 2012R2, you must register your ADFS server (not proxies).
If you Add a new server to your Farm, you must register it.
Server list is usefull to restart services, and participate to notification system for updating configuration automatically without restarting ADFS service.
This Cmdlet does not support remoting.
